channel.title: Server question
channel.description:
Wheres a place where I can get people to my server or I can go in their server?
Thank you.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 05:42:02 PM[/size][hr]Cmon please

item.title: Server question
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Download the moparscape 3.2 client here.Now open it up and type in a username and pass and go to the “help” tab on the client and click “server status” then pick a server you want to join thats on and type in the ip and log on.

to get people to your server read thism tut on how to make a server

Read full topic
